title: Revolution
creator_credit: Hugh Hudson, Irwin Winkler, Viking, Goldcrest and Warner Bros Pictures
brief_description: The personal story of Tom Dobb, a reluctant soldier in the American Revolution, his son Ned and the renegade aristocrat Daisy McConnahay is set against the larger backdrop of the American Revolution and what it has come to mean. Stars Al Pacino, Nastassia Kinski and Donald Sutherland with Joan Plowright and Annie Lennox.
